Comments: An excellent camera, great resolution and very low price. The amount of manual functions is very rare in this price range, and few cameras under two hundred can brag of full manual (aperature priority, shutter priority, etc.). Despite this, the camera is nearly a year old and a new model is replacing it at the end of Jan 2005 (the A510). Its suppose to be smaller and has a 4x zoom, so if it's not a priority I would wait until newegg gets these in in probably a month. It'll be worth the wait!

GREAT camera!  I am also using it as a video cam with my WinFast TV2000 XP Expert card that I bought here at Newegg for xx, it makes a good web cam when hooked to the winfast card. Just hook external power to the camera and set it so it does not auto power off. Also super for snapshots.. I put 4 Nimh rechargeables in it and it takes a lot of pix before needing a recharge.

Title: GREAT
Comments: Awesome Camera, nothing else really to say. No bad points to it at all!

Title: 1st Digi cam!
Comments:
I bought this cam on Nov 1, 2004 & I have been testing it out & some of the features it comes with. This cam is very impressive & is my 1st digi-cam purchase. One of the really kool features is the ability to record & play back live video footage. Last night I tested it out by recording about 30 secs worth of video footage of my older bro on the PC, he was taken back when I played back the vidoe on the cam to him, he was impressed. This cam has a load of features, but the manuals it comes with are pretty thick, so it will be a long read. The size of the cam is pretty compact, I'm in the process of purchasing a case for it & some rechargable batteries. In the manual they advise against using Lithinum batteries as they say they tend to overheat & could do so inside the cam. I am still playing around with the cam & trying to figure out the many, many, many features this baby comes loaded with. Overall I am very pleased with this purchase, but my only negative is that my A75 cam came with one dead pixel (green one) on the LCD screen. This is common with LCD monitors, it's basically something you have to live with. I still am giving the camera a 5 star rating despite the dead pixel b/c that's not the cameras fault, it's the LCD technology, oh well it's not a biggie, it's only one tiny, tiny dead pixel. If you're contemplating on whether to get this digi-cam, I'd suggest you pull the trigger. The price & boat load of features this cam comes with is a steal @ the price Newegg ha sit listed @.
Speaking of newwegg, their service was excellent as usual. I received an email asking me to contact them via phone after placing my order, when I called I was told it was for security reasons since I had purchased 2 A75 canon digi-cams & 2 Kingston 256mb CF. Since the total was $xxx they do this to protect against fraud & I was glad that newwegg takes such precautions. One last suggestion, get a case for this cam, rechargable batteries as this camera eats up lots of power from batteries & get yourself a 256mb memory in order to hold a bunch of pics & video. This cam comes with only a 32 mb CF, which is not enough for todays camera demands. Enjoy!

Title: Great little Camera
Comments:
I still have my Canon A40.  A great 2.0mp camera.  I got the A75 and it is a bit smaller, but has 3.2mp.  This is one great camera.  Very good feature set.  Great pics.  Great software.
You don't really need any additional photo editing software as the camera's internal processing delivers outstanding pics.

I just got this camera today, and so far am very pleased. For the money, its a great buy. The images are clear and the options on the camera are easy to use. I am not very digital camera savvy, but the a75 is easy to use and getting the pictures onto my computer was easier than expected. As usual, newegg delivers again with excellent service and fast shipping (i received order a day early!). This won't be the last time i shop at newegg, their service is outstanding.

Title: This Digicam Rules!
Comments: This is a fine entry-level cam. Takes superb pix and has enough manual controls for the curious neophyte. Having a little trouble with battery usage but I don't know if it's the camera or faulty batteries. Ordered on Tuesday afternoon, started taking pictures less than 48 hours later! NewEgg is groovy!!!!!

Title: 4th camera!
Comments: I decided I needed a more portable camera and sold my S5000 I bought here ata Newegg. This A75 takes great pictures and had a fast auto focus. Color is rich and focus is sharp. Will take 153 shots with a 256mb cf card at highest settings. Thanks Newegg for another great product and SUPERIOR service as always!

I've bought 2 of these for family members and everyone loves them. They are really easy to pick up and use but offer a lot of customization features for more advanced photographers. Canon has the best digital optics around, and this camera produces great quality photos. The bundled software has some great features too; I especially love being able to shoot the camera remotely from a PC, which is handy when taking indoor and macro shots where you don't want to move the camera a lot. The battery life is great too, you can easily fill a 256MB card before you need to swap the batteries. An overall excellent product at a great (sub-$xxx!) price.

Title: Nice camera for the money
Comments: Bought this camera a while ago. Took over 500 pictures in about a month when the camera would not work correctly. Ended up sending the camera to Canon for repairs which they quickly turned around. Have since taken hundreds of pictures (over a thousand at least) and it always goes on trips and hikes. People have been impressed with the picture quality and I like the versatility of the controls coming from 35mm SLR's. Buy the little case for the camera for convenience and protection and get some rechargeble batteries. I gave it a 4 only because of the first problems, which seem to have stayed fixed. Newegg and Canon were very good. Oh yes, the movie mode is acceptable and easy to use.

An excellent camera, great resolution and very low price. The amount of manual functions is very rare in this price range, and few cameras under two hundred can brag of full manual (aperature priority, shutter priority, etc.). Despite this, the camera is nearly a year old and a new model is replacing it at the end of Jan 2005 (the A510). Its suppose to be smaller and has a 4x zoom, so if it's not a priority I would wait until newegg gets these in in probably a month. It'll be worth the wait!

GREAT camera!  I am also using it as a video cam with my WinFast TV2000 XP Expert card that I bought here at Newegg for xx, it makes a good web cam when hooked to the winfast card. Just hook external power to the camera and set it so it does not auto power off. Also super for snapshots.. I put 4 Nimh rechargeables in it and it takes a lot of pix before needing a recharge.

Title: GREAT
Comments: Awesome Camera, nothing else really to say. No bad points to it at all!
